body:
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Load a deck with lots of mountains and Mizzium Mortars
2. Fill the table with at least 6 mountains
3. Play Mizzium Mortars

What is the expected output? Magarena should ask if a player want to use overload or not.

What do you see instead? Magarena asks for sourses to pay for six mana, overload is always used.


What version of the product are you using? 1.40
On what operating system? Win7


Excerpt from game.log file:

MAGARENA GAME LOG
CREATED ON 2013/08/19 11:54:38
MAGARENA VERSION 1.40, JRE 1.7.0_25, OS Windows 7_6.1 x86

...

LOG (P): Tap Mountain. Tap Mountain. Tap Rootbound Crag. Tap Rootbound Crag. Tap Stomping Ground. Tap Temple Garden. Pay {3}{R}{R}{R}. Play Mizzium Mortars.
MCTS cached=0
MCTS cheat=false index=1 life=9 time=8003 sims=844
* [6/467/?] (pass)
  [6/377/?] (Falkenrath Aristocrat)
LOG (P): Mizzium Mortars deals 4 damage to each creature you don't control.
LOG (C): Falkenrath Aristocrat is destroyed.
MCTS cached=0
MCTS cheat=false index=1 life=9 time=8012 sims=714
  [32/37/?] (pass)
* [46/663/?] (Tuktuk the Explorer)
  [22/14/?] (Knight of Infamy)
author: [ember.ha...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/118257407105291107710/)
title: When there is enough mana, overload is always used

comments.body:
Suspect this is due to overload ignoring timing restrictions. Fixed for all overload cards. Thanks for reporting!

**Status:** Accepted
